name: GDPR Article 32
description: EU General Data Protection Regulation - Security of Processing Requirements

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(a) - Pseudonymisation and Encryption
deliverables.description: Test implementation of pseudonymisation and encryption of personal data
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%pseudonymisation%'

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(b) - Confidentiality
deliverables.description: Ensure ongoing confidentiality of processing systems and services
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%confidential%' OR title LIKE '%disclosure%'

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(b) - Integrity
deliverables.description: Ensure ongoing integrity of processing systems and services
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%integrity%' OR title LIKE '%tampering%'

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(b) - Availability
deliverables.description: Ensure ongoing availability and resilience of processing systems

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(c) - Restore Availability
deliverables.description: Test ability to restore availability and access to personal data

deliverables.title: Art. 32(1)(d) - Regular Testing
deliverables.description: Process for regular testing, assessing and evaluating security measures
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings
